title: A Musical Instrument reeds in the river

content.prompt: In the context of the final stanza, the scene of the "reeds in the river" (line 42) most clearly symbolizes

choices.label: a collection of new poetic works
a chorus of voices singing together
an ordinary existence as a nonpoet
an escape from the influence of the gods

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Identify and explain the function of a symbol.
